author: CBR
description:
In this Heroes Journey Podcast clip, we discuss how the MCU has been struggling since the Infinity Saga and what can be done to fix it.

What do you think about it?

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 11.

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/5HgKKpGK0-0
- More Heroes Journey Podcast episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg
